name: Prism Dash
description:
Prism Dash is an inifinite runner mixed with the color matching of Simon. Use the arrow keys to change your color to match the obstacles in front of you for extra points. If you match the wrong color, you lose! 

Controls:

Z/X — Jump
Up Arrow — Change to Green Trail
Right Arrow — Change to Blue Trail
Down Arrow — Change to Yellow Trail
Left Arrow — Change to Red Trail

There is also a Rainbow Bonus that shows up on the level which will allow you to pass through all obstacles for points!

As your score increases the obstacles will start showing up more frequently. Best of luck! Let me know what your high scores are!
